Header: 11 Div Troops Support Sapling Planting on Victoria Banks
Content: In order to retain wetland areas surrounding the Victoria reservoir, 11 Division troops of the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) at the request of the Ceylon Electricity Board launched a sapling planting programme for two days (10 - 11 Sept) in the general area of the reservoir. Under the guidelines given by Major General Laksiri Waduge, Commander Security Forces - Central, a group of 10 soldiers of the Sri Lanka Rifle Corps (SLRC) on the instructions of Major General Senarath Bandara, General Officer Commanding, 11 Division joined hands with a large gathering of Electricity Board volunteers and other civilians in the area to plant saplings along the banks of the reservoir. Organizers thanked the Army for its assistance for the campaign.
